snippet: In the Chicago teachers’ strike, Mayor Rahm Emanuel’s oft-cited goal of expanding charter schools is not officially on the table, but a union official called it “the elephant in the room.”
abstract: Specter of plans to expand charter schools in Chicago hangs heavily over the teachers' strike, despite the fact that the issue is not officially part of negotiations between the city and the teachers union.
lead_paragraph: In the Chicago teachers’ strike, Mayor Rahm Emanuel’s oft-cited goal of expanding charter schools is not officially on the table, but a union official called it “the elephant in the room.”

headline.seo: Chicago Mayor’s Push to Add Charter Schools Hangs Over Teachers’ Strike
headline.main: Push to Add Charter Schools Hangs Over Strike
headline.print_headline: Push to Add Charter Schools Hangs Over Strike
